title: Minute Man National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Operating Hours & Seasons The grounds of Minute Man National Historical Park are open sunrise to sunset. Parking lot gates close promptly at sunset. NORTH BRIDGE VISITOR CENTER: 174 Liberty St. Concord MA. 01742 Open Daily: 9:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. April 1 - October 30, 2016 programs  MINUTE MAN VISITOR CENTER: 250 North Great Road, Lincoln MA.  Open Daily: 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. April 1 - October 30, 2016 programs HARTWELL TAVERN: Open Wednesday - Sunday, 9:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. June 18 - August 13, 2016 Open Wednesday and Saturday, 9:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. August 17- October 29, 2016 programs WHITTEMORE HOUSE Open Saturday through Wednesday, June 18 - August 13, 2016 Monday and Tuesday, 9:30 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. Wednesday, Saturday and Sunday, 9:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Open Tuesday and Thursday, August 16- October 27, 2016 9:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. programs THE WAYSIDE: HOME OF AUTHORS Open Thursday through Sunday, June 18 - August 13, 2016 9:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Sundays, 11;30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Open Sunday, Monday and Friday, August 14 - October 30, 2016 9:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Sundays, 11:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. programs CONTACT THE PARK HEADQUARTERS: (978) 369-6993
